Introduction

Lee Han Bin is a South Korean singer signed with PocketDol Studio. He is a member of the boy group FANTASY BOYS.

In 2023, he gained recognition when he competed on MBC's survival show Fantasy Boys, where he finished in 5th place. He made his debut as a member of the final group, FANTASY BOYS, on September 21, 2023.

On January 14, 2024, he debuted in a co-ed collaboration project called A SIX, which features multiple artists from PocketDol Studio.

On September 26, 2024, he was revealed as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7 starting in October 2024.
